title: List of Foreign Ambassadors Who Participated in Credentialing Ceremony – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
March 28, 2018
Below is a list of the foreign ambassadors who participated in the credentialing ceremony at the White House today with President Donald J. Trump:His Excellency Mamadou Haidara, Ambassador of the Republic of Cote d’IvoireHis Excellency Eric Andriamihajamananirina Robson, Ambassador of the Republic of MadagascarHis Excellency Shinsuke Sugiyama, Ambassador of JapanHis Excellency Otgonbayar Yondon, Ambassador of Mongolia
